1.content:
Daniel Davis has always been a good boy. He was an only child from divorced parents, and he spent his life growing up in the custody of his mother. He went to the Boy Scouts and climbed the ranks all the way to Eagle Scout. He played soccer in middle school, and he was now sixteen years old and started his sophomore year in High School.

He was quiet and shy, but he was liked and popular. He wasn’t the strongest or the tallest or the most popular kid in class. He never stood out, either. He was just average. He was only 5 foot 6 inches tall, skinny, with brown eyes and brown, short hair. He always wore t-shirts and blue jeans, and he walked to school since he only lived a few blocks away. His friends, and his mom kept an eye on him, but they were happy with his behavior and his grades.

Unknown to Daniel, or ‘Danny’, as everyone would call him, the gods also kept their eyes on him. There was a big discussion on Mount Olympus, and Zeus and Perseus were trying to make a point.

“Those mortals! So narrow minded… So selfish… They don’t think the way we do!” Zeus said out loud. “We look after the needs of others and we use our powers to help others! But these mortals only look after themselves!”

“I object to that, Oh great one!” Perseus retorted. “If you were to give a mortal the power of a god, he will also use that power to help others!”

“Oh! He might… But not after he makes himself rich! Or the ruler over all the earth!” Zeus sneered.

“Alright! I dare you to take a mortal, and to give him the divine powers on earth! Then you shall see!” Perseus argued. “Not all mortals are as corrupt as you think!”

“FINE!” Zeus roared in reply. “I will take a mortal, and I shall make him into a demigod! I will do this to show you how quickly he will become corrupt and use his powers for personal gain!”

“Alright! However, you must allow me to pick the mortal, and I must be allowed to guide him while he has his powers!” Perseus said in response. “If he is successful, he must be allowed to keep his powers as well!”

That night, Perseus appeared in Danny’s bedroom, just after Danny had gone to sleep. A bright light had filled the room, and it had caused Danny to open his eyes. He was astonished when he saw a strange figure standing in his room, wearing white robes and sandals.

“Arise, Daniel Davis! I am Perseus! I’m here to grant you the powers of a Demigod!” Perseus said to the boy.

Daniel got up and stood in front of the god.

“What? Who? Who are you?” the teen wondered curiously.

Perseus walked closer to him and places his hands on Daniel’s shoulders. Suddenly, Danny’s body was surrounded by a bright, blue glow. After a few seconds, the glow had passed.

“You are now a demigod. You have the power to do just about anything! You can change anything and anyone, just by saying the command. You can control anything and anyone. You can also teleport and read minds and thought of others. You may not use these powers for selfish gain only, but to help other people! And, you may not kill or destroy other people! Is that clear?” Perseus instructed.

“Yes sir!” Danny said softly. “I understand. But, am I still allowed to change my own body?”

“Of course…” the god replied.

“What if I make a mistake? What if I screw up?”

“I will be watching you so don’t worry…” Perseus assured him, before he disappeared.

He disappeared into thin air, leaving Danny alone in his room, wondering what the following day would be like, his first day as a demigod.
1.title: Meet Danny, the new demigod

choices: Danny tells Jake, his best friend, about his powers
Danny uses his powers on another boy at school
Danny uses his powers during class
11.content:
BUZZZ BUZZZZ… BUZZZ BUZZZ… BUZZZ BUZZZ…

Daniel reached over and hit the SNOOZE button on his Radio-Alarm. He quickly tossed and turned in his bed, until a ray of sunshine lit up his room. His bedroom door opened and his mom walked in.

“Danny! DANNY! It’s almost 7 o’clock, honey! You better shower and get dressed or you’ll be late for school!” she said.

“Oooohhhhhh….” Danny groaned, as he stretched and yawned, before he rolled out of bed. He had such a strange night. What was this strange dream he had, about a guy named Perseus who made him into a demigod?

He looked at his clock and realized he was running late. It was 7:03 AM.

“Crap! I still gotta shower! I just want time to stand still!” he said out loud.

Danny got into the shower and washed his hair. He rubbed soap all over and rinsed. Finally he dried off and got dressed. He put on his clothes and walked back in his room. When he glanced at his clock, the time was still 7:03AM.

“Huh?” he wondered. “How can that be?”

He quickly walked into the kitchen and saw his mother reading the newspaper.

“What time do you have to be at work, mom?” Danny said to her; as he sat down to eat.

No answer.

Danny suddenly looked up. His mother was completely frozen! She was staring at the newspaper, frozen in time!

“Mom?”

Danny walked up to her and waved his hand before her face. She didn’t even blink.

“Holy crap! I stopped time!” he gasped. “I- Holy crap! It’s TRUE! I- I’m a demigod! A DEMIGOD! Okay… Okay… Let me think…. I got this power…. What did I do? Oh! I say commands! I just give the orders! Alright…. THINK! Ummm…”

He took a deep breath before he remembered what he had uttered before he took a shower.

“Alright! I want time to unfreeze!” he said out loud.

His mother moved again.

“Finally! Are you ready to go to school?” she asked him. “Well, that was a quick shower!”

“Yeah, mom!” he said, with a deep sigh of relief.

Danny ate his cereal and walked out the door.

As soon as he was on the street, he turned both ways, making sure nobody saw him. He knew he still had about four blocks to walk, before he would reach the entrance to his high school, but he didn’t feel like walking.

“I want to be standing in front of my school, right now!” he whispered.

Instantly, he disappeared from where he was standing, and reappeared four blocks down the street, standing right in front of the entrance to his school!

“Whoa!! This is freaky!” Danny whispered to himself. “Freaky… But very, VERY cool!”

He walked in with a new air of confidence, knowing now that he was capable of doing just about ANYTHING, since he was a demigod.

As soon as the last class of the day was over, Danny wandered around school and thought about one of his friends, Jake Stevens. He magically teleported away and appeared walking right next to Jake. Luckily, Jake didn’t notice Danny popping up out of nowhere, since he was just staring out in front of him.

“Hey, dude!” Danny said to him.

Right away, Danny knew everything about Jake, from his wishes and desires, to his dreams and fantasies, his thoughts, memories, everything he ever experienced, to even what he would do in the future. He knew his length, weight, shoe size, blood pressure, and more.

“Hey, Daniel… What’s up?”

“Dude! I wanna tell you a secret!” Danny said to him, as the two boys left the schoolyard.

“Oh? What’s that?” Jake wondered.

“Dude! I gained these really cool powers! I can do anything! I’m a demigod!” Danny said with a wide grin on his face.

Jake stared at him with a look of disbelief.

“Yeah, right…”

“Alright! You’re a gamer! You’re into fantasy and science fiction! What would you like me to change about you?” Danny asked him.

111112.content:
Danny continued watching the television. Downtown, the fight with the fiery thief Volcana and electrically charged robber Livewire was…non-existent. “Superman” wasn’t anywhere to be seen!

The news coverage quickly discovered that “Superman” was actually off flirting with beautiful women. “Great”, Danny thought, “My friend could be stopping these supervillains but instead is off flirting with women. Typical. Still, I think I’ll leave everything as it is for a little longer…he’s sure to catch on and save the day.”

“Superman” was questioned by the media about why he wasn’t fighting the two supervillains downtown. “Superman” was put in an awkward and was slightly worried about what to do next. So…he flew far out of sight. But to where?


Danny used his powers to see where “Superman” was. “Superman” was juggling planets! Wait a minute…the news now said, “BREAKING NEWS: Due to the shift in planets, experts predict that global warming is a thing of the past! …We cannot believe it either.”

Danny figured this would be a good time to tell “Superman” to stop. And so he did. With just a thought, his friend realized what he had done and stopped rearranging the planets. And Danny then teleported him back down to Earth, back to right beside Danny.

Danny told his friend that if he ever did something foolish like that again, he would take away his powers. After all, “Superman” could’ve seriously hurt the world if he didn’t luck out and stop global warming. Not to mention the other planets. But mentioning them…


“Superman” revealed that there were “new” planets like “New Genesis” and “Apokolips”. Uh oh. These new planets were dangerous as Danny recalled…especially “Apokolips”. Just as Danny was about to turn everything back to normal (sans global warming, that was a nice bonus). But…Jake really wanted to be “Superman”. His eyes were begging and he could feel he really wanted a second chance. Danny decided to give him a second chance on one condition: “This time, actually act like Superman.”

“Superman” looked at the television. Despite the news about global warming, there was still chaos being caused by Volcana and Livewire. “Superman” said to Danny, “If I stop them, will you let me keep my powers?” Danny replied, “I guess…but don’t do anything stupid. Don’t…”


Before Danny could respond, “Superman” had already sped to the crime scene. Seeing both beautifulwomen, he stopped to stare for a bit…then got back to the job at hand. “Superman” said, “Stop right there ladies. I can’t allow these misdemeanors any longer.”

Volcana and Livewire laughed and then fired flames and electricity, respectively, at “Superman”. “Superman” withstood the pain and fought back, dodging their attacks and eventually landing knockout blows.

Taking the villains into custody, “Superman” was pleased and finally earned the right to remove the quotation marks. Superman returned to Danny and Danny felt that this could be fun. Enjoying their victory, Superman remarked, “This is going to be great. There’s no way this could go bad.”


And it did. But how?

"Why?" Danny said. "Why do you want to scare people with villains? I know you are Superman and you can defeat them, but... Don't you think everyone will be happier if we are in peace?"

112.content:
Danny had barely taken three steps inside when he saw Justin Waverly leering at a pair of freshmen, who were backed up against their lockers.

Danny frowned.

He'd known Justin, who was a junior, one year ahead of Danny, since 3rd grade. Danny had never really liked the guy, but he'd developed a major ego complex about three years ago.

An ego complex that wasn't completly unjustified. Justin was tall, popular, and handsome. Despite being a junior, he was the star of the football team. Girlfriends, for Justin, came and went every other week. He was blond and tan, and never had any problems with acne. His parents were rich, and so Justin was always wearing nice clothes. They'd also recently bought for him a hot-off-the line, banana yellow Hummer.

A Hummer. Those things weren't even vehicles in Danny's eyes, but gas-guzzling, greenhouse gas-emmiting status symbols.

" 'Sup Nerd, Fatty," Justin was leaning up against the lockers in a pose he probably thought cool, and smirked down at the two freshmen. 'Nerd' was lanky, probably between growth spurts, and wore a "Halo" shirt. Thick glasses peekd out from a bush of oily hair. 'Fatty' was, well, fat and dressed somewhat sloppily. A stain of what might have been powdered sugar dotted the upper left corner of his snug black shirt.

Danny, though he couldn't sense them, was acutely aware of the powers he now possessed. Perseus had advised him not to use his powers selfishly. Could there be a more selfless act than giving this bully a taste of his own medicine.

"Pause." Danny said, and Danny couldn't help but be amazed as time froze again, for the second time this morning. Danny walked over and placed a hand on Justin's forehead.

Like a stream, information poured into Danny's mind. He knew Justin's fears and secrets, his dreams and ambitions. He caught bits and pieces of memory, events that had shaped Justin into the person he was today. Also, came the statistics.

Justin, at 165 pounds, was slender but built. He hovered at around 5'11", without shoes. He was 16 years, 4 months, 12 days, and 37 minutes old. He would die in a little over seventy years, on a Tuesday. Completely heterosexual.

Whatever there was to know about Justin, Danny suddenly knew it. Everything from the bully's first words to his shoe size.

"Whoa...I could've done without some of that," Dany said, "But anyways...what's the best punishment for you, huh, Justin?"

Danny looked from Justin to 'Nerd' and 'Fatty' and snapped his fingers. Closing his eyes, he began rewriting the entry for Justin Waverly in the dictionary of the gods.

"Football was something Justin's dad always forced him into doing. His real hobby has always been anime and videogames. He hasn't played football since middle school."

Danny looked up and gasped at the new Justin before him. His football jersey and vintage jeans had been replaced by a pair of black, baggy jeans and a black tee shirt with an anime character on the front. Justin was scrawnier now, too. His muscles were now very light, from several years of disuse.

Danny wasn't done yet, though.

"Let's make him shorter too...about their height," Danny said, casually this time, as Justin shrank in height to about 5'4". "And what the heck? Let's make him younger too. A freshman, like these guys. And let's replace his cockiness with some good ol' social awkwardness."

Danny watched again as Justin's features became a bit younger. As Danny had rewritten Justin, the boy's pose had changed from an arrogant leaning to a shy slouch. Danny was confused, though, when Justin suddenly became more muscular.

"Oh, that's right. He's a high school freshman now, so he's only recently quit football." Danny realized, "Well, gotta fix that. One of the reasons Justin hated football was because he's a lazy person at heart. But he's a big eater too. He's always been kind of chubby."

Justin was no longer fit now, but plump. The baggy jeans became snug around his waist and rear end, and Justin's shirt now strained to cover an ample potbelly.

"Additionally, Justin will gain weight throughout high school until," Danny stopped, pondering, "Until he becomes fifteen or so pounds heavier than this kid next next to him, that he made fun of."

Danny continued to rewrite Justin's character.

He took away the boy's flawless skin, replacing it with occasional acne. His hair became unruly, and particularly hard to manage in the mornings. Justin was now shy around girls, and furthermore, he would eventually go through some sexual confusion issues. The outcome of those issues, Danny would leave to Justin and to fate.

His parents, while still rich, were now pennypinchers. Justin's Hummer had been exchanged for a used Corolla.

Finally, as the ironic icing to an ironic cake, Danny changed Justin's relationship with the boys he'd been tormenting. Enemies before, they were now friends, and had been friends since the 5th grade. Where before, Justin had been leering over the two, all three were now engaged in what appeared to be friendly conversation.

"Resume." Danny said, having changed everything he'd wanted. And like that, time was flowing again. Danny, willing himself to not be noticed, eavesdropped on the three of them.

"J-force! You still up for the Halo party at my house on Saturday?" 'Nerd' was asking Justin, who was apparently now nicknamed 'J-force'. "My mom's baking cheesecake brownies!"

"I'm up for the Halo, most definately. It's my game, yo! I can't help but own it!" Justin had snaked an arm around 'Fatty', using the other to pat his paunch. "But brownies, man! Why you gotta do that to me? I'll effing pig out on them!"

"And seriously, I've put on like fifteen pounds since I quit football. I'm gonna get so freakin' fat. And I'm already freakin' fat, I can't even wear my Kagome shirt anymore!"

The three of them were wearing outlandish grins.

"Oh gosh, and your mom's brownies! They're like...the nectar of the gods, in baked form! I'm gonna get sooooo fat..."

Danny stood in the hallway, watching as the three friends slowly walked off, presumably headed toward their classes.

Wow.

In less than ten minutes, Danny had transformed Justin from a bullying jock to a complete nerd. It was kind of frightening. Any lingering doubts he had about being a demigod were now thoroughly erased. He had the power.

Danny raised his palms and looked at them.

Oh yes, did he have the power.

13.content:
Daniel was so excited about his new god-like powers that he had to tell someone! The first person, who came to his mind, was Tom, his best friend. Tom was tall and skinny and he had jet-black hair. He was a computer geek who loved playing video games and who was happy spending his time messing with his iPod of playing on his laptop. Danny and Tom would often get together and hang out at the mall, the video game arcade, or the miniature golf park. They would wander around bookstores and video stores, or they would spend hours in their favorite pizza store, where they would play all the pinball games in the back of the store, after having consumed several slices of their favorite pizza.

Even though Tom only lived three blocks down the street from Danny, he decided to use his awesome powers and teleport himself to Tom’s house.

“I want to be standing before Tom’s house right now!” Danny said, while standing in his own bedroom.

Instantly Danny vanished from his room and appeared, standing in front of Tom’s house, about a fraction of a second later!

“Whoohoo! I love being able to teleport like that!” Danny cheered, as he walked up to the front door.

He rang the doorbell and patiently waited for the door to open. A tall, skinny boy opened the door. The boy immediately smiled when he saw Danny standing before him.

“Hey, Danny! What a surprise, dude! Come in!” Tom said.

The boys walked in and ran through the hallway into Tom’s bedroom. Tom closed the door and jumped on his bed, while Danny stood before him.

“Dude! The coolest thing happened to me, man! I’m serious!”

“What? Tell me!” Tom said excitedly.

“Well, instead of me telling you…. I just want you to know everything that happened to me since last night!” Danny said out loud.

Tom blinked for a moment, and then stared at Danny with his mouth wide open.

“You… You’re a DEMIGOD? Holy smoke!” Tom gasped. “And you got these cool powers? Wow!”

Tom suddenly knew everything about Danny’s powers.

“You got it! So, I can change anything about you! Anything you want!” Danny grinned.

“Ahh…. Hmm… Let me think about that…” Tom said, as he pondered what to ask.

While Tom thought about what to ask Danny to change about him, Danny stared his best friend in the eyes and did a “scan” of his mind and body. Instantly, he knew EVERYTHING that there was to know about his best friend. Not that he didn’t know a lot about him already, but now he REALLY knew everything from his exact age, his weight, his height, shoe size, his exact time and place of birth, to the day he would die. Danny even knew all of Tom’s thoughts and memories from his entire life… ever!

“Dude… Right now… I know everything about you!” Danny chuckled. “I swear… Absolutely everything!”

“Oh come on… You’re joking!”

“I know that your grandmother calls you ‘Tommyboy’…” Danny laughed.

“Whoa!” Tom gasped.

“I also know that you still sleep in your Spider-Man pajamas…”

“Oh! Come on!” Tom protested.

“And I know that you have a crush on Nicole at school…”

“Oh man, you got me! Don’t tell that to anybody, okay?” Tom pleaded with him. “That’s my deepest, darkest secret!”

“I know everything, dude!” Danny said with a grin. “So, what would you like for me to change?”

Tom finally had his answer…
13.title: Danny visits his best friend

131.content:
"Could you please make me taller?" Tom asked. Danny chuckled.

"Aren't you tall enough already?" Danny asked his friend, who was 5'11. Tom just gave Danny a smirk.

"Yeah, but i've always wanted to be taller. Yeah, it sounds weird, so sue me". Danny just nodded and said the command out loud, "I want Tom to grow".

Danny saw Tom flinch, which he knew was the energy flowing through him. It started off slow with Tom only gaining one inch, but as the seconds passed the change was taking full effect. There was only one problem.

"Hey Danny, how tall am I going to get?" Tom asked. Danny mentally kicked himself. He didn't wish Tom to be a giant, so he knew Tom wasn't going to get that big, but he knew he should have given a specific height.

"Sorry, Tom" Danny said to his growing friend, "I di-"

"It's okay, I was just wondering. Besides I feel it slowing down". Tom was right. The growth finished seconds after and Tom's clothes were straining to stay on his 10 foot tall frame.

What do Tom and Danny do?

132.content:
"A giant?" asked Danny, "Well that's certainly a bit different."

Tom nodded, eager to be really tall. But instead of suddenly being several hundred feet tall, a massive plethera of merchandise for the New York Giants filled his room. Everything from posters and jerseys, to signed footballs by the team and many a picture of Tom with various people at their games.

Now this had surprised Tom at first, but as soon as he got the joke, he burst into laughing, nearly falling on the floor. Tears welled up in his eyes since he was laughing so hard. For a moment, Danny thought Tom might not be able to breathe due to his near-gasping, but that thought was quickly pushed away as Tom slowly stopped laughing and caught his breath.

"Dude...that was hilarious. I wasn't even expecting that at all." Tom said, as he fully calmed down and sat on his bed to calm his heart.

"I know, I saw a chance, and I couldn't help myself." Danny replied, to which he finished by returning Tom's room to how it was previously. "Now then, how big do you wanna be, and how fast do you wanna grow?"

"Umm...one hundred feet seems good, and I wanna grow quickly." Tom responded.

"Ok then. But I'm gonna change reality as you grow. I don't want anybody suspecting anything yet. I mean, your mom would flip if she saw you were suddenly 100 feet tall." said Danny, standing back from Tom's bed.

Tom seemed a bit disappointed, but understood.

Now Danny began to actually turn his best friend into a giant. Tom wanted fast growth, and so he would get it.

Before he could realize it, Tom was already 6 feet taller, and gaining inches by the second. By the time Tom noticed he was growing he had already gotten to nine feet tall and nearly at ten. Now reality changed in very obvious ways (before they had been subtle, and only Danny himself had noticed). Tom's head was nearly at the ceiling, when it seemed to suddenly grow with him. His previously very messy and full room began to thin out, as most of his furnture seemingly vanished, and soon after was replaced with a much more sparse room. Even then, as he hit his halfway mark of fifty feet, nearly everything in his room was gone. His clothes had grown along with him, but seemed a bit more...worn than they were before. Almost by the time he got to 100 feet tall, Tom heard a "whoosh" like sound, and then everything stopped. Tom wasn't sure why, but he knew that he now lived far out in the country to keep away from prying eyes.

"Well dude, there you go. One hundred feet tall." 'said' Danny, though he was actually speaking right into Tom's mind. Tom got down on all fours to see his normal sized demigod-of a friend standing there, looking very pleased with his work.

"Wow...I can't believe it. I feel so...powerful. It's weird dude. We know that I'd never hurt anyone, but you're just so....so small." thought Tom, since talking probably would have hurt Danny's ears.

"So, now what do you wanna do?" asked Danny, though he already knew the answer.

“Whoa!!!” Tom gasped, as his biceps grew bigger while his arms thickened. His chest pushed out further as his pectorals grew into big spheres of muscle. His legs widened and thickened as his quads turned into big slabs of muscles. His calves bulged out like softballs sticking out from the back of his legs.

“Looking good, dude!” Danny grinned, as he witnessed Tom transform into a teen bodybuilder before his eyes.

Tom’s flat torso turned into a washboard of thick, cobblestone abdominals, which lined up like tiles on the bathroom wall. Everywhere, muscles continued to push out and enlarge even more, making the boy bigger! His lats made his shoulders wider and wider, and his delts started rising up from behind his neck! Tom was truly becoming very impressive!

“Uhhh…. I-Im getting too big!” Tom uttered. His arms were started to spread a little bit farther from his body, due to the massive muscle. He was growing wider and wider!

“Alright! That’s enough! Stop growing!” Danny said. And Tom’s muscles stopped growing right away.

“Uhh… I can’t move, dude! I’m too big!” Tom said out loud, as he tried to walk.

Right away, all Tom’s muscles shrunk down just a bit, still leaving Tom as a big muscular teenager! This time, he was able to move again!

“Wow!” Tom exclaimed, as he flexed his arms. “I’m really strong!”

“I’ll fix your clothes so that they’ll fit you now…” Danny chuckles. “Like it?”

“Oh yes!”

Danny and Tom thought about what to do next…
