"I don't follow you... You mean I must wear a cape and briefs like Superman?"

Tommy laughed.

"Haha! Not exactly. You could keep your singlet as a uniform, but yes, you would cool with a costume like Superman. Anyway, I was talking about doing favours to other people.
Imagine a father that wants to spend more time with his son, you'll be there to turn him into a kid! Imagine a kid that wants to work out with his father at the gym, you'll be there to turn him into an adult!"

"Do you think it's a good idea?" Daniel asked his best friend.

"Of course!"

"Okay then!" Daniel said. He had to admit it sounded good, it was the best way to help people with his demigod powers. He snapped his fingers and...

FLOOOSH! After a white flash that blinded Tommy for some seconds, Daniel was already wearing his new superhero costume. His skin was fully filled by a red tight fabric that covered almost all his body. He was also wearing long blue boots and gloves, and also blue briefs with a golden yellow belt. He had a big golden 'D' on his chest. He kept the same muscles he had some seconds ago, and he really looked like a real superhero!

Suddenly, Tommy also noticed that he was also wearing a similar costume! It was almost the same, but it had blue and red colors swapped, he was wearing a silver belt and his chest showed a big 'T' made of silver too.

"Hey! Why did you change me too?" Tommy asked.

"From now on I'm known as Super Dan, the famous superhero. Everyone in this city knows me." Daniel said as he flexed his arms. "And you are my helper and assistant, Titan Tom. So forget about your father's old job, you are coming with me." Daniel winked.

"Really!? Cool! Does that mean I have magical powers too?"

"No, sorry, I can't do that. Unfortunately, I'm only allowed to be the only one Demigod on Earth. But I gave you some necessary superpowers like superstrength, flying and teleporting."

"But if I don't have magical powers, how I am going to help you?" Tommy wondered.

"You will understand everything tomorrow!" Daniel grinned.

Tommy knew that he could trust him, so he decided to go to sleep, next day was going to be their first day as superheroes and they had to rest. Daniel created a new room on Tommy's home and slept there. Both slept wearing their new supercostumes, they felt very comfortable with them, it was like a second skin.

Next day, Tommy left John in school. He was ready for his first day as a superhero. He teleported himself to his home again, where Daniel was waiting for me.

"Let's go...!" Daniel said.

"Where are we going today?" Tommy asked.
134311.title: Dan, the hero!

choices: First day at school of John and Daniel!
First day at job of Tom!
134312.content:
"I think I'll turn into a kid like your father." Daniel said.

"What? But I thought you liked being an adult!" Tom said.

"Yes, it's very cool! But now that I'm a demigod I know that some people is going to need my help, specially the kids. They are the ones with more dreams and fantasies, and if I become a kid and go to school with them I'll be able to help them!"

"Are you sure, Dan?" Tom asked.

"Of course. And I also want to ask you a favour."

"Tell me, I owe you a lot!"

"I want to live with you and Johnny."

"What!? But I...!"

"Don't worry! I know you will be able to take care of two kids!" Daniel laughed. "I want to stay here because even if I turn into a kid, you are still my best friend. And I want to stay with you if someday you need my help."

"Okay dude, I guess I have no choice. I wanted you to stay as a huge wrestler with me so we could work out together, but maybe having you as a son can be a funny idea too!"

Daniel stood up.

"Okay. Wanna wrestle with me? Tomorrow I'll wake up as a kid, so I want to enjoy my last hours as a supermuscular adult!"

"Of course!" Tommy smiled. Suddenly, the living room started to change. In only some seconds all sofas and furniture merged into a wrestling mat.

Next day, little John woke up. As he opened his eyes he noticed that a bed that wasn't there last night appeared next to his. A supermuscular kid of his age was sleeping there. And he was wearing exactly the same Speedo as him!

"Hey! Wake up kid! Who are you!? What are you doing on my bedroom!?" John said a bit scared.

Daniel opened his eyes slowly... He totally forgot! John didn't know anything about his transformation! He was going to tell him what happened, but Tommy opened the door before he could say anything.

"Dad! Wait!" he said.

Tommy explained everything.

"...and for that reason, Dan turned into a kid. He's going to be your brother, dad."

"My brother? Cool!" John said. Tommy smiled, he still could not believe that he had two kids! And he was very proud of them, they were the most muscular 8 years old boys of the world! They were like a little copy of himself!

"Okay kids, today is your first day at school and my first day at dad's old job. Come on, let's go to the bathroom, you must have a shower!"

The kids quickly took off their Speedos and ran naked to the shower.

"These kids..." Tommy smiled as he picked up their Speedos in the ground. The muscular kids were already under the shower, playing with water and laughing like any other kid of their age. Meanwhile, Tom was preparing the breakfast.

After having the shower, the kids wore their wrestling singlets (they chose red singlets) and had breakfast. They were ready for their first school day! Tom wore a tie over the wrestling suit, he looked weird but Daniel promised him that everyone was going to like it. He was also ready!
134312.title: A brother for little John.

14.content:
Danny woke up early the next morning, unable to get to sleep because of the vague dreams that plagued his mind. Dreams about monsters, dark creatures, and the death of the innocent people who happened to cross their path. Danny in all of his life had never experienced dreams as horrible and as frightening before today. Danny quickly ate breakfast, and decided to take a quick walk around the neighborhood to clear his mind, and regain his sense on reality. Good thing it was Saturday, today.

“Ok, Danny last night you were not visited by a strange hippie wearing a toga with golden Sandals, I am not a demigod, I don’t have god like powers.” Danny said walking down the sidewalk stroking his eyes, which were irritated, and burning for some strange reason.

Danny’s eyes seemed to burn with every passing second, and as time passed the burning seemed to get worse.

“What the hells wrong with my eyes?” Danny asks feeling genuinely concerned.

Danny’s vision was blurred, he could barley see his hand in front of his own face, the pain was just to great, but the burning pain soon disappeared, leaving Dannie’s vision forever changed, altered.

“What in the world.” Danny said looking around his surroundings.

What Danny saw blew his mind serval times over. Strange creatures made of light flew through the sky. Gigantic plants covering buildings, the streets were filled with sparkling creatures of different sizes, these creatures were everywhere, crawling on the ground, climbing buildings, sitting on houses, their were even a few creatures on people’s shoulders. It almost looked a little beautiful how these creatures seem to glow, all in different colors. But what was strange, was that people acted like these creatures didn’t exist, it was almost like these creatures were invisible.

“Oh my god what is happening to me?” Danny asked grabbing his head with both hands.

“This is it, I’ve cracked. Oh man, oh man, oh man, what am I going to do? I’ve gone crazy.” Danny says.

“Why are you filled with so much woe Daniel Davis?”

Danny turns around and sees the exact same man he saw last night. But the man was dressed differently. The man wore a white shirt, he had on black Nicky shorts and flip flops on his feet. Really the only thing that was the same was the mans curly brown hair and eyes.

“It’s you.” Danny said looking at the man in shock.

“I’m sorry I didn’t get your name.” Danny says.

“Oh right how rude of me, I was in a rush last night, I am the great god Perseus.” The man says striking a heroic pose.

“You are a god?” Danny asks looking at the man named Perseus with a little doubt.

“Like thee god, you know the Tower of Babel, burning bush, Noah’s ark, god?” Danny asks.

Danny wasn’t a believer in the divine, he never really had a reason to believe, and let’s just face it, this man didn’t really look like a god, last night when he was wearing his white toga, golden sandals, and glowed with golden light, sure he looked like a god then, but now Danny was not all that sure.

“Oh no, no, no, I would never claim to be that important, but a god yes. Im Perseus from Greek mythology.” Perseus says with a smile.

“You mean the son of Zeus Perseus.” Danny asks.

“Yep that’s the one.” The man says putting his thumb up.

“Your a god? It never said that you became a god in the myth.” Danny says, trying to think back to when I had red Greek mythology.

“Yea that part was edited out of the story books. But I am a god, and I’m here to help you Daniel Davis.” Perseus says grabbing my shoulder with his right hand.

“Good because I really need your help, I’m seeing things, lights, strange creatures.” Danny says rubbing his eyes.

“Yes, I suppose you are, it’s nothing to be afraid of, it’s just your body adjusting.” Perseus says putting his hands on his hips.

“Adjusting? Adjusting to what?” Danny’s asks.

“To being a demigod, remember I told you last night.” Perseus says.

“You are not a normally made demigod, so your body is still adjusting to the power.” Perseus said walking towards me.

“What does this mean?” Danny asks a little scared.

“It means that you have the sight.” Perseus says.

“The sight what’s the sight?” Danny’s asks

“Its the power to see the world beyond the world. It’s the power to see through the fog.”

“What’s the fog?” Danny’s asks.

“It’s the substance that clouds the sight of mortals hiding anything supernatural from their eyes. Only beings that belong to the supernatural world can see through it.” Perseus says.

“So those lights, those plants, and creatures....”

“Are spirits, and spiritual plants.” Perseus says cutting me off.

“Spirits, spiritual plants? What the hell are those.” Danny’s asks.

“Well spirits are beings born from nature, and spiritual plants are plants that house spirits, their branches can also be used for different purposes.” Perseus says.

“Don’t worry they are mostly harmless, especially these weak spirits, and they are actually very helpful when it comes to preserving nature.” Perseus says with a gentle smile.

Danny couldn’t believe this, his whole world seemed to be turning upside down.

“So I’m really a demigod?” Danny’s asks

“You are really a demigod.” Perseus says nodding his head.

“Well actually you are more powerful than a demigod, you are a demigod that can do almost anything.” Perseus says.

“Anything?” Danny asks.

“Anything. But just because your power is infinite doesn’t mean that you yourself are infinite. So be careful.” Perseus says with a series tone.

“Okkkk.” Danny says not really knowing what Perseus was talking about.

“Well don’t worry you shouldn’t get into to much trouble, and as I’ve said before I will be watching over you. Zeus doesn’t like the gods interfering with mortals, especially now a days, but I should be able to help you a little.” Perseus says.

“Can I just ask you one more question?” Danny asks.

“Shoot.” Perseus says

“Why did you pick me for this power?” Danny asks.

Perseus looks at Danny for a few minutes.

“Tell you what, I’ll tell you one day when you are ready.” Perseus says with a smile.

Thunder roars throughout the sky.

“Well I guess that’s my time to go.” Perseus says glowing with golden light.

“Well thank you for this opportunity. Lord Perseus.” Danny says with a smile.

“I believe in you Daniel Davis, remember the rules, do not use your powers for evil... Be well child.”

Perseus soon disappears leaving me alone.

“Oh man what am I going to do first.”
14.title: Danny walks around the neighborhood

143.content:
Danny was determined like never before. This, this was his chance to be somebody, somebody great, to help others for the sake of doing good. But before he could help others he had to know what he could do first. Surely Perseus wouldn’t have a problem with him testing his power out a little bit, would he?

“So I can do anything? Well I want to stop time.” Danny says.

Danny looks around his surroundings and realizes that everything, and everyone has stopped moving completely. Even the spirits were as still as statues.

“This is amazing!” Danny shouts at the top of his lungs.

Danny running down the street sees a red car parked by the sidewalk. Seeing the car, a smile appears on Danny’s face.

“I want Absolute strength.” Danny’s says. (Absolute strength is infinite strength)

Danny walks over to the car, kneels down and with great ease picks the car up. Danny felt mighty, he felt powerful. This was life, this was his life.

“Oh, I love you Perseus.” Danny’s says with a little laugh.

Danny slowly and carefully puts the car down.

“I want time to return to normal.” Danny’s says snapping his fingers.

Time resumes like nothing had ever happened. Danny’s fun was not over yet, it was just starting.

“I want absolute speed.” Danny’s says with a little smile. (Absolute speed is Infinite speed)

Danny starts to jog at incredible speeds. Danny, just jogging with ease broke the sound barrier. Danny jogged all across California in 3 minutes, and he didn’t even break a sweat. Danny lived in the small city of cypress, it only took 5 seconds to explore every nook and cranny of the whole city. Danny started to feel tired so he decided to stop a few blocks away from his home.

“Whew, I’ve never had fun like that.” Danny says wiping the sweat from his forehead.

Danny started to walk home as soon as he realized that the sun was going down. Apparently he spent the whole day having fun with his powers, well deep down he had no regrets. He had fun, and also worked up a good sweat along the way.

Danny walking down the side walk hears a loud roar a few feet behind him. Danny quickly turns around to see a glowing red spirit standing in the middle of the road.The spirit was around 20 feet tall. Danny knew that this spirit was different from the others he had encountered, it had a foul smell, and it emitted a powerful killing intent as it gazed at Danny. Danny gazed at the spirit with astonishment, it almost looked like a king crab, with the right claw bigger than the other, and it had six legs, each leg had hundreds of spikes protruding from the sides. The spirits shell looked hard and sturdy. The spirit had four eyes, each eye was fixed on Danny.

Danny started to back up slowly, really how could no body sees this monster, Danny thought as sweat started to run down his forehead. The spirit crab started to inch closer and closer to Danny, Danny could tell that it was getting ready to attack.

“Oh man, oh man, oh man what am I going to do?” Danny asked feeling terrified.

“I thought Perseus said that these spirits where harmless.” Danny said.

Danny turns around and begins to sprint down the sidewalk. The spirit crab with a ear shattering roar starts to chase Danny down the sidewalk. To regular people, Danny seemed to be sprinting down the sidewalk for no reason, they just couldn’t see through the fog, and therefore couldn't see the giant spirit crab chasing after Danny.

Danny was feeling tired, he had to do something because the spirit crab was catching up..

“Oh wait, I have infinite power.” Danny says hitting his forehead.

“Alright time to take care of this crab.” Danny says feeling more confident.

Danny stops running and faces the spirit crab, which was coming right towards Danny at great speeds.

“Time stop!” Danny yells.

The spirit crab begins to stop, as time itself begins to come to a halt. Danny felt like it was possible to defeat this monster, but before he started to make his next move, his chest began to hurt, and his body began to burn up.

“What’s, what’s happening to me?” Danny asked breathing hard.

The spirit crab began to move slowly, time seemed to start to move again, even though it was not as fast as before. Danny’s body was aching all over. He could still move, but every movement made his body hurt more. Danny didn’t know why his body was hurting so much, but he soon came to the conclusion that it was his powers doing this to him. Did he some how over load his powers, by using them to much?

As time passed the spirit crab began to move even faster, Danny had to do something.

“Supernatural strength!” Danny yelled. (Supernatural strength is super strength, which is weaker than absolute strength).

Danny wanted to use his absolute strength, but deep down he knew if he were to us absolute strength again, he would only kill himself. Right know Danny has to be careful, right now Danny’s powers were not on his side. Danny was about to battle a monster, he could hardly believe himself. It was a good thing that nobody was around to see this or to be more precise, to see Danny fighting nothing but air.

Danny had one thing going for him, time was still moving slowly, therefore the spirit crabs movement speed had greatly diminished.

Danny ran forward ready to attack the crab. The crab seeing this, uses his right gigantic claw to take a swing at Danny. Danny to the spirit crabs surprise was very quick, as he ducked below the claw dodging it completely, and with a powerful strike of his fist, sends the spirit crab flying 10 feet away. The impact of the spirit crab landing in the ground cracked the pavement, creating a loud explosion, that even normal people could hear. Danny didn’t strike with a hundred percent of his power, but he was still surprise to see the Spirit crab uninjured from his previous attack.

The spirit crab totally recovered from Danny’s attack runs towards Danny, completely consumed by its wrath. The crab was faster than it was before, which took Danny by surprise. Once again the spirit crab swings at Danny with its right claw. Danny once again dodges by jumping back, but the crab still doesn’t stop attacking, but this time it uses its smaller left claw, which moves at lightning speed compared to the bigger claw. The smaller claw hits Danny’s right in the gut, Danny receiving the powerful attack bends over gasping for air, but unfortunate for him the spirit crab was not done attacking. The spirit crab attacks Danny with its right giant claw, Danny not having enough power to dodge gets hit by the giant claw. Danny goes flying into a telephone pole, completely snapping it in half.

Danny had his back against the wall with blood running down his face. So much for this being the greatest day of his life. He thought as he looked at the spirit crab. The spirit crab raises its right claw and opens it wide, a bright light starts to appear in side the claw. Danny deep down knew what was happening, but deep down he hoped he was wrong. To bad he wasn’t wrong.

The light grew bigger with every passing second, until finally a huge beam of Energy shot towards Danny with great speed. Danny knew that the crab was preparing some kind of beam attack, therefore he was ready, ready to jump out of the way, even though it hurt him a lot to do so. “BOOM”, The whole entire wall was blown away, and smoke filled the air.

Danny had to end this and he had to end this now. Danny looking at the broken telephone pole got a idea. Danny reverted his eyes back to the crab who looked to be as drained as he was. The crab was quite skilled in Danny’s opinion, it’s small claw it used for quickness and it’s bigger right claw it used for power, the beam was made to finish off its opponent. But now it’s one, two, three combo had failed and it was tired. Danny still had his super strength thank god. Danny walks over towards the broken telephone pole and picks it up with both of his hands.

“Ok you fricken monster bring it on.” Danny says getting in a fighting stance.

The spirit crab once again runs forward and takes another swing at Danny with its left claw, which was still fast but not as fast as before. Danny this time was able to dodge the attack, but once again the spirit crab starts to let loose a barge of attacks, Danny was able to dodge every attack with great difficulty. Danny jumps 30 feet in the air with the telephone pole in hand, right above the spirit crab.

“TAKE THIS!!!!!!!!” Danny yells.

Danny shoves the tip of the broken telephone into the crab, breaking its shell and impaling its body. The spirit crab let’s out a loud painful roar as it falls to the ground dead. Danny landing on the pavement falls down to tired to move. Danny gazed at the now dead monster, and sees it vanish like smoke. The battle was over, he was the victor. Before Danny lost consciousness he saw three people stand right in front of him. Danny couldn’t see what they looked like, but he could tell that it was two men and a girl.

“Is it him?”

“Yes that’s him p, without a doubt.”

“To think that he would be this powerful.”

“What are we going to do with him.”

“We will take him to the school.”
143.title: Trouble brewing

1431.content:
Danny sat on the wet green grass over looking a large lake. The air was cold and covered in a dense fog, that seemed to limit Danny’s vision quite a lot. The fog didn’t bother Danny all that much, no in fact something about this place made him feel comfortable. Was it the water from the lake, the grass he sat on, or maybe the pine cone trees that surrounded the whole area, that seemed to calm his nerves, he did not know, nor did he care, all he wanted to do was stay here in this place.

“Champion of the gods it is time that you wake up.”

Danny upon hearing a feminine voice quickly turns around to see a beautiful women with long blond hair, staring right at him. The women wore a pure white tunic that covered only her right leg, but completely exposed the other leg. On her arms rested golden bracelets that sparkled with great intensity. The women wore a small crown covered In diamonds, each diamond sparked like a star in the night sky, and on her shoulder rested a little owl, which gave off a strange feeling as it stared at you with its acute gaze. She reminded Danny of Perseus, the first time they had met. Could she be a god, Danny thought as he looked at her. The women’s eyes were vigilant as if she was expecting someone to attack her, but more than anything they were gray like storm clouds. Danny could tell as he stared right into them with astonishment.

“Who are you?” Danny asks.

Upon hearing Danny’s question the women reveals a little smile.

“Do not concern yourself with my identity child, for right now you must wake up, with a understanding of the fate you hold in your hands.” The women says

“What are you talking about?” Danny asks, honestly he was tired of people talking in riddles.

“You do not understand my words, well at least understand this child.” The women says putting her right hand on Danny’s shoulder.

“You must act with wisdom before you use your powers, and you must be careful, for many gods above the heavens and many gods under the earth want you to fail in your mission.” The women says growing serious.

“Well i must be on my way.” The women says glowing in a golden light.

“Until we meet again champion.”

“Wait you didn’t tell me who you......”

Before Danny could finish his sentence the women had disappeared.

“Are..... great.” Danny says feeling a little angry.

The dream soon starts to fade and Danny wakes up in a comfortable bed.

“It was a dream, only a dream.” Danny says with a little nap it of sweat on his face.

Danny waking up from his dream feels something on his head. Danny wondering what it was uses his right hand to grab the object stuck to his forehead. Danny soon held a small yellow sticky note in his hands. Danny flips the sticky note over and sees writing on the front.

“Hey kid, good work fighting the spirit, you should be proud of yourself. I saw that you had a little trouble but in the end you figured it out. But remember you need to be careful on how you use your powers. Your
power is infinite but your body is not, use to much of you power and your body will be destroyed 😟. That’s why I told you to be careful. So I made you a list of the powers you should try to avoid using. Power like absolute, divine, transcendent, meta, almighty, are powers you should try to use a little as possible. Well either way I will be watching over you so keep up the good work. From Perseus. OH and P.S. you have switched schools.😉”

The letter was from peruses. Danny once said He loved that god, well P Danny wanted to take it back.

“Now you worn me about my powers.” Danny says a little annoyed.

“And if you were watching why didn’t you help?!” Danny yells.

“The gods don’t usually offer their help to people young man.”

“Oh God!!” Danny yells, surprised by the sudden voice he heard.

Danny turns his head to the far corner of the room and sees a man sitting in the shadows. The man had light brown hair, and a scare that looked like a lightning bolt surround his right blue eye. The man wore a black jacket that seemed to come down to the mans ankles, the jacket had a small hood in the back, and had white trimmings, the jacket didn’t seem ordinary to Danny, deep down he knew it was not normal. The man also whore black pants and black military strapped boots. On the right side of the mans chest was a silver badge that looked like a star. Danny didn’t know who this man was but he knew he wasn’t someone to mess with.

“Who are you?” Danny asks.

“Me I’m Paul, Paul Finch. And you are?” The man named Paul asks as he stands up and walks towards me.

“I’m Daniel Davis, but just call me Danny.” I said.

“Danny it is.” Paul reaches out for a hand shake, and I, not wanting to be rude shake his hands.

“So Paul were you watching me sleep?” I asked.

“No! Well yes, but I was under orders to make sure yo stayed in this room.” Paul says

“Who ordered you?” I asked.

“Oh don’t worry you will meet him someday. Congratulations by the way for defeating that corruption.” Paul says patting my shoulder.

“What’s a corruption.” Danny asks feeling confused.

“You know that evil spirit.” Paul says.

Danny automatically thinks back to that moment In time when he almost died. The spirits crab, talk about a miracle. Danny looks at Paul.

“So that thing was called a corruption?” Danny asks.

“Yep, and you defeated it, all by yourself.” Paul says.

“What is a corruption.” Danny asks.

“I know you have a lot of questions Danny but you are going to have to save it for later, we have someone to meet.” Paul says with a smile.

“Wait a minute I thought I couldn’t leave this room.” Danny asks.

“Well you cant, not without me. My orders were to take you took the principle as soon as you woke up.” Paul says.

“The principle?” Danny asks.

Danny thought back to the letter that Perseus sent him, somewhere in the letter Perseus said something about a new school.

“Oh great.” Danny says getting out of bed.

Paul leads Danny to the principles office. The journey was filled with a lot of turns and a lot of stairs. Danny soon realized that he was in some kind of dungeon before Paul had come to get him out, Danny couldn’t help but think what kind of school had dungeons under ground. As Paul and Danny walked through the school, Danny was able to see many things, like the boys and girls locker room, the regular lockers, the swimming pool, which had a few beautiful girls swimming in it. Danny also saw a few basket ball courts, a tennis court, and a grassy filled that stretched out for miles and miles with no end in sight. Danny honestly didn’t know how it was possible. Danny then saw a huge dome like building, Danny asked Paul what it the building was for, Paul explained to Danny that the building was for music classes. Danny looked like a child who had visited Disney land for the first time in their lives, shocked excited, overwhelmed etc. Paul even told Danny that he didn’t even see half of the school yet.

“How can your school be this big? I mean it has to be the biggest school in the world.” Danny says.

“Well, I think I’m going to let the principle explain it to you, he could always explain it better than me. Paul said with a smile.

As Danny and Paul walked through the school, Danny couldn't help but feel like he was being watched. Danny looking around notices that every student that him and Paul passed was watching Danny with great entrust. Danny could even see some of the students whispering to each other, while staring at him. Danny hated being the center of attention, but their was little he could to help it. Danny could have used his powers to make everyone mind their own business but decided against it, not wanting to put strain on his body.

“Why is everyone looking at me?” Danny asks Paul.

“Well word has gotten around of a so called champion of the gods.” Paul says looking at Danny.

Danny remembered the women form his dreams, that is exactly what she Called him.

“Danny it is also no secret that you killed a corruption all on your own. Their are many students here who haven’t even seen one yet let alone fought one.” Paul says with a little laugh.

Danny sighs hard. He didn’t know how this New found attention was going to affect his daily life, but all he could hope for was that nothing bad happened because of it.

Paul and Danny soon stand in front of a door with the words principles office branded in the middle. They were on the highest floor to the tallest building that occupied the school.

Paul knocks on the door three times.

“Come in.”

Paul and Danny hearing the invitation, opens the door and walks into the room

“I’ve brought him principle Leon.” Paul says,

“Yes thank you very much Paul.”

Danny sees a man sitting behind a large wooden desk. The man was well built, and looked like he could be a body builder. The man had dirty blond hair and a small dirty blond beard. The Man wore a suit that looked a little to tight to hold his well built body, and yet he seemed to make it work. Danny looking into the mans eyes saw that the mans eyes were not normal like a humans, but were a little cat like. Another weirdo Danny thought. The man getting up from off his chair smiles and sticks his hands out as if he was about to give someone a hug

“Welcome to Half Blood High school Daniel Davis.”
1431.title: New school

14311.content:
Danny looks at principle Leon with confused eyes. This guy seemed a little to jolly in Danny’s opinion, but Danny wasn’t one to turn down a invitation.

“Thank you, principle Leon was it?” Danny asks.

“Yes that is my name, it is a honor to meet you.” Principle Leon says walking over to Danny, putting his right hand out for a handshake.

Danny shakes principle Leon’s hand.

“The honor is all mine.” Danny says with a nerves laugh.

Principle Leon after shaking Dannie’s hand walks back over to his desk and sits down in his chair. Principle Leon stares at Danny with a smile on his face, a smile that made Danny want to curl up into a ball. Ever since Danny could remember he had always been shy, he had gotten better over the years but their was still a few times when his shyness would resurface.

“Look principle Leon, what is this about me going to a new school.” Danny asks.

Principle Leon smile soon disappears, which alerted Danny that he had touched on a very serious topic.

“Well I guess we should just jump into it then should we?” Principal Leon says with a serious tone.

“Daniel Davis starting from this moment on you are now a student of half blood academy.” Principal Leon says.

“What, why? Why must I change schools?” Danny asks feeling a little irritated.

“Please understand Daniel Davis this is for your own protection.” Principle Leon says.

“My protection? Protection from what?” Danny asks, even though he had a idea as to the answer.

“Protection from the monster you had faced earlier.” Principle Leon says.

“I have already killed that thing, it will never hurt anyone ever again.” Danny says.

“Do you think that was the only one, corruptions are endless, plus their are even greater threats out their you have yet to face.” Principle Leon says.

Danny didn’t want to imagine it, their were more dangers out their, dangers a lot greater than the corruption that he had faced. It scared him.

“What are corruptions?” Danny asks.

“Corruptions are evil spirits, created from a variety of evil acts, and evil thoughts.” Principle Leon says looking a little sad.

“Evil acts and evil thoughts?” Danny asks.

“Yes, negative emotions from mortals sometime result in a corruption or impurity from being born.” Principle Leon says.

“Impurity?” Danny asks.

“Another name for corruption.” Principle Leon says.

“Another case of a corruption is when a regular spirit, turns into a corruption, because of their negative emotions, that taint their very being.” Principle Leon says.

“ so spirits can also turn into a corruption?” Danny asks.

“Yes, spirits are beings composed of pure positive energy, when a spirit experiences to much negative energy they fall into corruption.” Principle Leon explains.

“That’s terrible.” Danny says.

“Yes it is, spirits who turn into corruptions are usually the most powerful of the bunch, actually the corruption that you faced, probably uses to be a spirit at one point in time.” Principle Leon says.

So what does this have to do with me?” Danny asks crossing his arms.”

“A lot, corruptions are drawn to demigods, like moths to a flame, the more powerful the demigod, the more corruptions are drawn to them.” Principle Leon says.

“And If what lord Perseus said is true than you are the most powerful demigod, that exists right now.” Principle Leon says.

“You’ve talked to Perseus?” Danny asked.

“Yes he appeared to me a few days ago. He was the one who told me about you, and it was his idea that you come here. Oh and he wanted me to tell you something as well.” Principle Leon says.

“What did he want to tell me?” Danny asks.

“Something he forgot to tell you before.” Principle Leon says.

“Of course.” Danny says, slapping his head.

“He wanted me to tell you that the more you use your powers the more impurity’s are going to be drawn to you, impurity’s and other more powerful monsters, so be careful, also he wanted to tell you that you should also refrain from using Omni powers.” Principle Leon says.

“Omni powers?” Danny asks.

Danny remembered the list of powers Perseus had told him to watch out for, Omni powers were not on the list.

“Perseus said that out of all the powers in your arsenal, Omni powers are the most dangerous, and should never be used unless it is absolutely necessary.” Principle Leon says.

Omni powers must be very powerful if Perseus was warning him not to use it.

“Damn what else is Perseus hiding from me.” Danny thought.

“Perseus has also told me of your situation, so I know of your almighty power, me and a few other selected people, as soon as I found out about you I sent three people to collect you, one of them was Paul, the other two you will meet shortly.” Principle Leon says.

Danny looked at Paul and remembered the three people he saw before passing out. Paul simply smiled at Danny.

“I’ll leave up to you whether or not to keep it a secret.” Principle Leon says.

Many of Danny’s questions had been answered, but still their was still a few things he just didn’t get.

“What makes this place, different from the outside world? Why am I safe here, and not out their?” Danny asks.

“That is simple to explain. This whole area is protected by the gods, and lies in another dimension than the regular world.” Principle Leon says.

“In another dimension?” Danny asks feeling a little light headed.

“Yes, in another dimension. Monsters will never be bale to find this place because it lies separate from the regular world.” Principle Leon explains.

“We can control everything in this infinite space, the size, the weather, even day, and night, everything is under the control of the school.” Principle Leon says with a smile.

“In here we offer protection to you, and to people like you.” Principle Leon says.

“People like me? What do you mean.” Danny asks.

“What, did you think you were the only demigod out their?” Principle Leon asks looking at Danny.

“Their are others?” Danny asks.

Upon asking this question principle Leon began to laugh, even Paul who Danny forgot was in the room with him, began to giggle a little bit.

“Daniel Davis, almost every student that goes to this school is a demigod.” Principle Leon says with a smile.

Danny was taken back from this news. Danny had seen a lot of demigods walking throughout the campus, it was hard to believe that all of those people were demigods.

“Even Paul here is a demigod.” Principle Leon says.

Danny turns towards Paul.

“Your a demigod?” Danny asks.

“Yep but I’m not a artificially created demigod like you.” Paul says scratching his forehead.

“Artificially created?” Danny asks.

“Artificially created demigods are demigods, not born between a mortal and a god. They are being ps that were once human but were transformed into demigods. Like you, yourself.” Principle Leon explains.

“So I’m a artificially created demigod?” Danny asks, not likening the sound of that.

“Yes, but don’t worry, you are not alone, their are many demigods that are artificially created, you may meet a few in class.” Principle Leon says, seeing the look of anger on Danny’s face.

“So If your not a artificially created demigod, than who’s your godly parent?” Danny asks Paul.

“Oh, well my dad is Thor from Norse mythology.” Paul says with a smile.

“Thor, wait there are other gods that exist, other than the Greek gods.?” Danny asks

“Of course, their are many pantheons of God’s that exist, and many of their children come here for training.” Principle Leon says.

Danny seems even more confused, their were other gods than the Greek gods now. Plus principle Leon said something about training, what training, Danny thought. Everything seems to be happening to fast, their was to much to comprehend, to much to understand.

“You said their where even more powerful monsters out their, more powerful than corruptions?” Danny asked.

“Yes a lot more powerful, monsters and demons that seek to throw our world into chaos, it is our job to train you to be prepared to face these threats.” Principle Leon said.

“Knock, knock, knock. Someone was knocking at the door.

“Come in.” Principle Leon says.

A girl walks into the room. The girl had short brown hair that came down to her shoulders, and she had brown eyes. The girl seemed to be around Danny’s age, give or take a few years older. The girl wore the same uniform Paul whore. The only difference being, that the girls jacket didn’t go all the way down to her ankles, but stopped at her waist, the girl wore long black Jean pants, and had on the exact type of boots on her feet as Paul. She also wore a silver badge on her right shoulder.

“Daniel Davis, this is Abigail Rose, she will be giving you a tour around the campus, she was also the second person I sent to get you.

Danny once again remembered the girl in the three man group. The girl lightly bowed her head.

“It’s nice to meet you.” She said with a smile.

“The pleasure is all mine.” Danny says

“So shall we get started?”
14311.title: Enrollment to a new school

143111.content:
Danny and Abigail walk through the school, both barely uttering a single word. Abigail showed Danny a few of the class rooms he would be joining, she showed him the different activities he could join when ever he wanted to, activities like basketball, tennis, and even swimming in the schools personal pool that even had its own jacuzzi. Honestly Danny had never seen such a beautiful school in his life.

Abigail soon took Danny inside of the huge dome like building he saw before when he was walking with Paul. Abigail had told Danny that this building was called the Apollon pavilion. Before Danny even walked inside he could hear the sound of music dancing inside both of his ears. Music that kept on getting louder and more beautiful as he drew closer. Soon Danny along with Abigail found their way all the way inside of the music building. Danny had never seen so many students inside one building before. Each student held a musical instrument in their hands, and the few who didn’t where singing, each student with a instrument played it with such mastery and skill that Danny was brought to tears from the beautiful music generated.

“Oh god, what’s happening?” Danny asks wiping the tears from his eyes.

“Don’t worry it happens to everyone their first time experiencing it.” Abigail says with her hands on your shoulder.

“Experiencing what?” Danny asks still crying 😭.

“The melody of a demigod.” Abigail says with a smile.

After a few minutes of watching the music class Danny and Abigail decide to leave. Abigail walked in front of Danny as they both exited the building, as Danny walked behind Abigail he heard the sound of Abigail sniffing, and he could of sworn he saw a small tear run down her cheek.

“Abigail are you ok?” Danny asks concerned 😟.

Abigail quickly wipes her tears and turns to face Danny with a smile on her face.

“Yes I’m ok Danny.” She says sounding all cheerful, but Danny some how knew it was a lie.

Danny and Abigail soon found themselves outside of the Apollon Pavilion. Danny looked at Abigail as she thought of the next place she should take him.

“Hey Abigail I have a question.” Danny says.

Abigail breaking out of her train of thought, looks at Danny.

“Oh yeah, what’s your question.”

“I’ve just learned that many gods exist, not just the Greek pantheon, so why his this huge building named after Apollo only?” Danny asks.

“Well I don’t know all of the details but I heard that Lord Apollo had won a bet with the other gods in charge of music. Apparently lord Apollo won and therefore this whole entire building was named after him.” Abigail explained.

“This isn’t the only building though. Their is the thunder palace.” Abigail says pointing towards a humongous building that stood on a mountain miles away in the distance. The building was so big it almost reached all the way in the clouds ☁️. Clouds the roared with thunder and shot out lightning that continuously struck the building. Danny thought it was weird that he didn't notice that building until now.

“The thunder palace was built in honor of Thor himself. Their are of course other buildings that where built in honor of other gods. In truth Danny you haven’t even seen half of the school yet, you’ve only seen a small portion so far. Danny couldn’t help but be taken back from that statement. Danny had already seen so much, but apparently he still had a lot to see.

Abigail and Danny continued their walk around the campus. While walking something caught Dannie’s eye.

“Uh Abigail what’s happening over their?” Danny asks pointing at a beautiful rainbow 🌈 bridge that was miles along in width and had countless people walking on it, all going in different directions.

“That is the Bifrost bridge 🌉 that connect the campus to the neighborhood.” Abigail said with a smile.

“Neighborhood?” Danny asks.

“Yes the neighborhood. You see some Demigods decide to live here inside the barrier where it is safe. All for different reasons. Some just don’t feel like leaving, and others can’t leave because they are powerful demigods and therefore it is to dangerous to leave the safety of the barrier. So when that happens they can choose to live here, with the condition that they join the order.” Abigail says.

“What’s the order?” Danny says curious.

“The order is a elite organization that dedicates itself to protecting the world from evil threats. Threats like that corruption you faced.” Abigail says with a series tone.

You and Paul are part of the order aren’t you? That’s why you wear those uniforms and badges.” Danny says looking at Abigail

“You would be correct me and Paul are part of the order.” Abigail says with a smile filled with sadness as she looks at Danny with eyes filled with pity, which confused Danny even more.

Danny thought back to the corruption he fought, the corruption he killed. He couldn’t imagine facing any more of those creatures. Danny once again looks at the rainbow bridge. The bridge seems to go on for miles but at the end Danny could see a huge neighborhood filled with houses apartments and mansions that where very beautiful. It didn’t look like a bad place to live.

“So that’s the Bifrost bridge from Norse mythology?”

“Oh gods no.” Abigail says with a little laugh.

“They share the same name yes but this bridge is nothing but a pale imitation of the real Bifrost.” Abigail says.

Danny couldn’t even imagine this beautiful bridge being nothing but a imitation. It was so beautiful and majestic. Danny couldn’t help but wonder what the real Bifrost must look like.

”their are dozen of these imitations all around the campus, each bridge takes you to a different area in the barrier.” Abigail explains.

Abigail and Danny walk towards the grassy fields that went on for miles. Danny saw hundreds of students. Almost every student was wearing battle armor and had a weapon in their hands.

“This is were you will come for combat training.” Abigail says as you both watch the students fight and practice.

Each student was in their own groups, groups filled with hundreds of students. For each group their was one instructor that lead the group. Danny notices that many of the instructors didn’t look that much older than him, and yet each radiated confidence and respect, all of the things Danny Himself didn’t.

As Danny and Abigail watched the students train, the ground started to rumble, which made everyone stop what they where doing.

“Do you guys usually get earthquakes?” Danny asks curious.

“No we don’t.” Abigail says with a serious tone.

BOOM!!!”

The sound of a explosion echoes in the distance. Danny and Abigail as well as every student turn towards the explosion, to see smoke fill the air.

“It came from the school grounds.” Abigail says, and wasting no time sprints towards the campus. Danny along with a myriad of students in battle armor sprint after Abigail.

It didn’t take Danny, Abigail and the other students to make it to the sight of the explosion. What they saw took their breaths away.

The ground was set a flame 🔥 a huge crater rested in the ground and in the middle was a 10 foot monster with a body covered in molten rock and fire, with two giant horns on top of its head, and two giant swords in both of its fiery hands.

“WHERE IS HE???!!!!” The monster shouted with vile in his words.

“WHERE IS THE GOD CHILD!?”

Danny deep down knew that this monster what ever it was, was talking about him. Danny noticing Abigail looking at him told him that he wasn’t the only one.

“Oh crap.”
143111.title: A Campus tour, the monster of fire

1431111.content:
Crimson fire 🔥 filled the air devouring everything it came in contact with. Danny had never seen fire like this before, a fire that made him feel nothing but fear and terror. Danny didn’t know if it was just his imagination but as he looked into the Crimson flames he could see every sin he had committed, all the wrong doings, he had done in his life, and without warning a sense of guilt overtook his very soul. All of the Crimson flames came from this one creature that stood 10 feet, covered in molten rock and had two horns on top of his head large enough to impale anyone with ease. Suddenly Danny feels someone grab his shoulder and with fear looks to see that it was Abigail who looked just as frightened as he did, with sweat coming down her face. Abigail looking into Danny’s eyes mutters only one sentience, that Danny could hardly make out from all of the screams the other demigods where making.

“Don’t look into the fire!” Abigail yelled as she pulled Danny towards her, as she unsheathes the small golden blade that danny didn’t noticed hung at her side. The blade glowed with dazzling light as the sunlight bathed it in its raze. Abigail assumes a fighting stance as if she was ready at any moment to attack the creature that stood before her. Danny couldn’t help but be amazed as he along with every body else stood behind Abigail, Danny didn’t know how Abigail wasn’t afraid but he hoped it would be enough. With out hesitation Abigail turns her head and looks at A guy that Danny didn’t recognize. The guy in question didn’t seem to be much older than Abigail and had black hair brown eyes and wore a red sleeveless shirt and black Nicky pants along with white running shoes that were covered in grass. Danny soon began to remember were he saw this person . This person was one of the instructors that was leading the training out on the field. Danny watching Abigail have her silent conversation with the instructor sees the instructor nod his head, as if he agreed to something that Abigail had said.

“Everyone, retreat!” The man yells with a commanding tone. Not needing to be told twice every demigod in the area starts to run towards the Bifrost bridge. Soon the only ones still in the area was Danny Abigail and the instructor who gave the order in the first place.

“Everyone has evacuated to their respective neighborhoods, backup should be here soon.” The man said as he looked at Abigail.

“Good now take Danny and get to safety now.” Abigail ordered.

“No Abigail let me stay and help you.” The man says not wanting to leave his friend to fight a battle that could cost her, her life.

“No Mathew it to dangerous.” Abigail said not taking her eyes off of the monster even for a minutes.

Danny after learning the mans name looked towards Mathew who stood next to him, and just like Mathew wanted to stay and fight with Abigail, but found himself asking himself would he be of any help.

“You guys need to lea.......” Before Abigail could finish her sentience she notices the creature take a small step forward.

“”WHERE IS HE?” the creature asked with a voice filled with anger.

“WHERE IS THE GODCHILD?”

Deep down Danny knew that this creature was talking about him, in fact out of the three, the only one who was confused was Mathew himself.

The creature with its Firey eyes looks towards the group of Demigods and soon its eyes narrow in on Danny who stood in the middle of the three demigods.

“THEIR YOU ARE.”” The creature stayed with a threatening tone that sent chills down Danny’s back.

Crimson flame soon starts to gather in side of the creature right hand as. The fire soon forms into a large crimson fire ball that seemed to get bigger and bigger with each passing moment.

“DIE FALSE GOD!!!!” The creature yells throwing the ball of fire towards Danny and the two Demigods beside him.

Danny wanted to panic but with all of his strength managed to keep a calm mind, even in the presence of certain death. Danny closes his eyes and concentrate on the power deep inside him.

“[ICE MANIPULATION]” Danny says with a deep voice.

Without warning a huge wall of ice rises from the ground giving the three Demigods protection from the coming attack. Abigail and Mathew with shock evident on their faces look at the ice wall as if it were the most amazing thing in the world.

“What the! Where did this come from?!” Mathew yells. Mathew takes a glance at Danny and notices something. Mathew noticed that Danny’s hands where covered in ice as if they were frozen. It was at that moment the Mathew understood that Danny himself was behind this phenomenon.

The ball of crimson fire finally makes contact with the thick wall of ice and a loud explosion echos throughout the entire campus. Dense steam starts to fill the air as the huge fire ball begins, to Danny’s amazement, begins to break through the large wall of ice with relative ease.

“How the hell did the ice wall not work?” Danny asked.

“Regular ice will not be able to stop that kind of fire.” Abigail said walking besides Danny with her golden sword in hand. Danny soon realized that Abigail wasn’t trying to push him way this time, Danny realized that Abigail came to the conclusion that she was going to need all the help she could get if she was going to take care of this monster.

“What kind of fire is that?” Danny asks as he looked at the monster before him.

“It’s called hell fire, one of the most dangerous fires in the world.” Mathew says as he stand in the other side of Danny with two small daggers in his hands. Danny had a bad feeling ever time he looked at the daggers that rested in Mathews hand. Both daggers had a skull 💀 design and each radiated A ghostly light that seemed to suck away Danny’s will to fight when ever he looked at them. Danny didn’t know much about weapons but something was just telling him that thought daggers where just dangerous.

“Hell what now?” 🔥🔥🔥🥺😣😱
1431111.title: Fight begins, creature of the crimson flame 🔥

1433.content:
Danny slowly opens his eyes with his body aching all over. Danny lying on the stone pavement slowly gets up rubbing his eyes. Danny tried to stand on his feet but soon his body was hit with a sudden dizziness that caused him to begin to fall over slowly.

“Careful. You used a lot of energy fighting that corruption.” A teenage girl says as she puts her hand around Danny to stop him from falling.

Danny looks up, staring at the girl who had caught him. The girl had long brown hair, and striking blue eyes, she wore a open black jacket 🧥 with silver trimmings and sliver buttons. Underneath the girls jacket was a black tank top. On her right shoulder she wore a silver badge that almost looked like a police badge but was bigger and had writing on it, but it was a language that Danny didn’t understand. The girl also wore short shorts and military boots 👢.

“Who are you?” Danny asks fighting through the pain he felt.

“Don’t worry we’re friends.” A man says walking towards both Danny and the mystery girl.

Danny saw that whoever this man was he was wearing the same black silver jacket as the girl, he also had long black pants and he also wore black military boots. The man had short orange hair and his eyes were a deeper blue than the girls. Looking closer Danny could see a scare that covered the mans left eye, a scare that looked like a thunder bolt. Danny looking down could see two small hammers that hung at his wast.

It took about five minutes for Danny to be able to stand on his own without falling over, his whole body still felt horrible but he could deal with it.

Danny stared at the two strangers, and as he stared at them , he couldn’t help but think about that creature he fought a few hours ago. Danny looked around trying to find its corpse, but as he searched around, he couldn’t find any trace of a dead crab 🦀, the only thing that was evident was that their was a battle that had taken place. The ground was ripped apart, walls had been torn down and cars had been flipped over. Danny honestly couldn’t believe that he and that monster had caused all of this damage

“You won’t find a body any were.” The man says with a small smile on his face.

“Excuse me?” Danny asks.

“You were looking for the dead body of that creature right?” The man asks.

“Yea I was.” Danny says.

“Well the bodies of corruptions vanish when they are vanquished, their bodies are made from pure negative energy so, when they die they merge back into the environment.

“I’m sorry corruptions? What’s a corruption?” Danny asks, as he stared at the man as if he had two heads.

“Look theirs a lot you need to learn, and right now is not the time to teach you.” The girl says with a serous tone.

As Danny looked at the girl he couldn’t help but blush, Danny was never good at talking to girls. The prettier the girl the harder it was for Danny to talk to them, and seeing as how beautiful this girl was, Danny could barely get a word out, even though she gave off a kind of deadly aura that made Dannie’s skin tingle. The girl didn’t carry a weapon like the guy, but Danny could still tell that she was just a dangerous.

“You need to come with us.” The girl says breaking Danny out of his train of thought.

“Come with you to were?” Danny asks.

“To headquarters, you need training, you’ll get that training at the school.” The man says.

“Wait a minute I don’t even know who you guys are, I got to get home.” Danny says putting both his hands up.

“Look Danny right?” The guy says stepping forward,

Danny wasn’t sure how he knew his name but it didn’t make him feel any better.

“You are not safe, home is not safe ok?” The man says putting his right hand on Danny’s shoulder.

“No not ok I’m leaving.” Danny says with a demanding tone.

“Wait you can’t just leave.” The girl says stepping forward trying to block Danny’s way.

“[Teleport].” Danny says.

Danny thinks about his room and in a bright flash, Danny vanishes.

“Were did he go?” The man says looking around confused and shocked.

“I don’t know but I have a good place to start looking.
1433.title: The Two strangers, run home boy run

14331.content:
It was 8:30 pm when Danny had arrived home. Danny had teleported to his room, which was pitch black since Danny hadn’t been in his room all day and the lights where turned off. Danny could hardly breath, once again he put himself in a dangerous situation by over using his powers, he knew deep down that he should have never teleported into his room but Danny just needed to leave that area, he just needed to leave those two strangers that gave him the creeps.

Danny slowly opens his bed room door, he could hear his parents talking downstairs, probably about him. Danny knew that he was in big trouble he had broken his curfew, so Danny knew that their would be hell to pay. Danny turns on his bedroom light and sits down on his bed.

“Danny Davis get down here young man!” Danny’s mom yells from down stares.

“Oh brother.” Danny says breathing hard.

(A minute later)

“You coming home this late, unacceptable young man.” Danny’s mom yells as Danny sits down on the living room white couch 🛋.

“Yea kiddo you know you have a curfew, you worried me and your mother Half to death.” Danny’s father says standing right beside Danny’s mom, both staring down at their son.

“I know, I know, I just lost track of time.’ Danny says look down at the floor.

Danny couldn’t tell his parents about what really happened early today, how could he? Danny knew that his parents would never believe him, and would probably sign him up in a mental institution.

“Danny honey you look pale, are you ok?” Danny’s mom says with a worried look on her face.

“Oh my god George, our little boy was out taking drugs, I knew it, I just knew it.” Danny’s mom says looking at her husband with small tears in her eyes.

“Hannah, Hannah lets not jump to conclusions, Danny would never do such a thing....... would you Danny?” Danny’s dad says as he looks at Danny hoping for a good answer.

“No... No of course not. I would never do such a thing.” Danny says standing up.

“You see honey our boy would never.....” Danny’s father stops mid sentence as his face grows shocked and concerned.

Danny soon realizes that his father was no longer looking at him but something else, something behind him.

Danny turns around and stares out of the glass window that rested behind the living room couch. What Danny saw turned his pale face even paler. Something looking like a large fire ball was headed right towards the house.

“Oh no [Forcefield]!” Danny yells as blue energy raps around his whole entire body.

“BOOM!!!!”

The whole house is engulfed in flames, as wood and glass fly across the whole neighborhood. Danny slowly opens his eyes and sees his house burning, with him standing in the middle of everything covered in a body lengthened forcefield.

“Mom! Dad!!!!” Danny yells looking around his fired infected house.

It didn’t take long for Danny’s to spot his parents, which were both trapped under fallen rubble. Danny could hardly move as he made his way over to his parents. Danny instinctively knew that he could not use another power, if he did he would die. But not even the threat of death would stop him from saving his parents.

Danny fought through the pain as he pulled both of his parents away from the burning rubble, but as he pulled, something had caught his eye, something that shocked Danny enough to stop pulling his parents out of harms way.

It looked like something was moving in the fire, something big, something covered in flames 🔥.

“What is that?” Danny’s says as he looked at a humanoid monster on fire.

The monster was 8ft tall and looked like it was made out of molten rock, Danny could not make out its eyes but he knew that it was staring at him. The monster slowly began to walk towards Danny, and it didn’t look like it wanted a hug.

Danny turned to look at his parents, he couldn’t fight that monster, not now, his body was too weak and his parents were still in danger.

“Get down!” Danny hears a voice yell, a voice that sounded familiar.

“BOOM!!!” Lightning 🌩 smashes into the molten monster at high speed causing another explosion that threw Danny off his feet.

Danny was in pain his body was covered in cuts and once again his vision became blurry, but he couldn't pass out not know. Danny looks up to see a man and a women standing in front of him. Danny soon realized that these people where the same people he met early today. The man with orange Hair and the beautiful women with long brown hair, both still wearing a black and silver jacket. Danny soon realized that something was a little different about the two strangers. The man was covered in some kind of lightning aura, as he held both of his hammers in both hands, the girl was holding a golden sword 🗡, which confused Danny, who swore that he didn’t see her holding a sword before.

Danny didn’t know who these guys where, heck he didn’t even know their names but deep down he was happy they where here to save him. Danny started to smile but as he turned to look at his parents his smile faded away.

“Mom, dad.” Danny calls as he sees both of his parents not moving.

Danny trying to move suddenly feels a sharp pain that runs throughout his whole entire body. His body was losing strength fast. That last thing Danny saw before he lost consciousness was both of his parents lying on the ground covered in cuts and serious burns.

“Please... be .. ok.” Danny utters out as he passes out

Danny slowly opens his eyes, as he lay in bed 🛌.

“Where am I?” Danny slowly says sitting up slowly.

“Whoa, whoa easy cowboy 🤠 easy.” A women with long blond hair says as she sits down at the edge of The bed with a smile on her face.

“Where am I?” Danny asks looking around his surroundings, noticing that he wasn’t in his room anymore. Danny was in a room filled with beds and curtains, it almost looked like a hospital room

Danny soon remembers the flaming monster that had caught his house on fire, he also remembers his parents.

“Where’s my mom and my dad?” Danny asks grabbing both of the blond women’s shoulder.

“Where are they!!” Danny yells again.

“Please calm down Mr. Davis, you suffered serious injuries, you need rest.” The women says trying to calm Danny down.

“No I need to know where my parents are, you have to tell me.” Danny says tears starting to fall from his eyes.

“Lacy. I’ll handle this.”

Danny and the girl named Lacy turn to see the same orange haired man that danny had met earlier. The man did not wear a smile, he wore a look of despair as he looked at Danny.

“Very well but he needs rest, so please make it quick.” The blond haired women says as she stands up and leaves the room. Danny for a moment saw her look at him with a sorrowful look.

Danny looks at the orange haired man with a look of fear.

“Where are my parents?” Danny asks once again, his voice shaking from the fear.

“Your parents are dead.”
14331.title: The monster in flames.

143311.content:
It had been 3 days since Danny had been given the terrible news concerning his now dead parents. Danny had not moved from the hospital bed, he did not have the strength nor the will to face the world. Danny did not sleep, he hardly ate, it all but seemed as if Danny was slowly waiting for death. The girl named lacy would check in on Danny everyday to make sure he was ok, but Danny hardly ever spoke to her, What was their to say? Danny didn’t see the orange haired warrior that had saved his life the day his parents died, Danny believed that was for the best. Danny would never admit it but he felt small bits of anger whenever he thought about that man and that girl, after all they didn’t save his parents. Everyday Danny would stare down at his white bed sheets as if he Where expecting them to get up and dance but alas they never did.

The door to the hospital room slowly opens as the orange haired man walks in. Danny slowly and lifelessly looks over at the man who had saved his life to see that he wasn’t wearing the same uniform he was wearing before. The man wore a light blue shirt as well as black jean shorts, with black flip flops. Danny said nothing as he stared at the man, but his anger started to slowly rise.

“Look who’s up.” The man says with a smile as he walks towards Danny’s bed.

“I thought I should check on ya.” The man says getting a small stool and sitting down.

“I don’t know, how would you feel if your parents had died?” Danny says sarcastically.

The room goes quite as both Danny and the man stop talking. The mans smile disappeared and he refused to make eye contact with Danny.

“Yea kid, I wanted to say that I was sorry for what happened to your......”

“[Peak Human Strength].” Danny says cutting off the man from his sentence.

“BOOM!”

The sound of a loud explosion echos throughout the whole hospital as the entire floor is filled with dust and small ruble. People fall to the floor in surprise as a shadowy figure stands inside the dust cloud.

The dust soon fades, and Danny is standing tall as he tightly grips the orange haired mans neck, the wall behind him completely destroyed. Tears are falling down both his cheeks as he stares at the orange haired mans face with eyes filled with rage.

“You, you should have never mentioned my parents!” Danny yells as his grip grows tighter around the mans neck.

“I, I’m s, sorry.” The man struggles to say as he coughs, struggling to breath.

“My parents are dead, why didn’t you save them!?” Danny yells once again.

“W, we tried.” The man says once again.

“Why!!!”

“Let him go!”

Danny turns around upon hearing a familiar feminine voice. Standing tall with the same dagger like eyes was the brunette girl that Danny had met before. The girl stared at Danny with anger in her eyes.

“I said let... him... go” The girl says threateningly.

“He’s the reason my parents are dead!” Danny yells looking back at the man who’s neck he was still clutching.

“No.” The girl says.

Danny looks at the girl with utter shock and surprise.

“No?” Danny asked not being able to believe what he had heard.

“No.... you are the reason your parents are dead.” The girl said walking towards Danny.

“What did you say?” Danny asked with anger in his voice.

“Your parents are dead... and you are the one who killed them.

Danny lets go of the mans neck who plummets to the ground holding his throat coughing. Danny slowly walks towards the girl ready to fight.

“We told you that you were in danger, and yet you ignored our warnings and went off without help or proper training.” The girl continues to speak.

Danny soon stands in front of the girl, both hands clenched into fist 🤜.

“Your the reason your parents are dead and you know it.” The girl says with utmost certainty.

Danny does nothing but looks into the eyes that scared him a few day ago. Danny doesn’t speak, he doesn’t lash out in anger he only stares into the girls eyes.

“Your.... your right?” Danny says putting his head down, not being able to look the girl in the eyes anymore.

All of the anger started to fade away as Danny’s body was overcome with pure sadness.

“I, I just miss them so much.” Danny cry’s still staring at the ground, tears falling on the floor.

The girl walks forward and puts her arms around Danny, as he cried. Everyone in the building did nothing but stare at the girl and Danny as they embraced, to shocked to do anything.

The orange haired man stands up, after having caught his breath.

“Well glad that’s over.”
143311.title: The path to anger, trail of tears

info.brief_description: The gods had decided to change a teenage boy named Daniel into a demigod.
info.description:
This is the story of Daniel Davis, a sixteen year-old teenager who is chosen to become a demigod. He is 5 foot 6 inches tall, has brown hair and brown eyes, and he is an average high school student. Life is just normal until one day, just after he has gone to bed, Perseus appears in his bedrooms and transforms him into a demigod with seemingly unlimited power!

Please:
-No one-line chapters. Those will get deleted.
-Please check your grammar and spelling.
-Feel free to add new characters.
-No killing off the main character. I will delete those chapters.
-No sex in any chapters. Those will get deleted.
-Transformations and changes are encouraged, such as growth, size change, shrinking, growing, muscle growth, height change, inanimate object, age regression, age progression, transgender, bodyswap, animal, mind control, and the like.
-Daniel has the power and is the ONLY character with the power. Please keep it that way and stick to the story.
-Email me with your ideas if you wish to write a chapter that deviates from the story line.
-Daniel was chosen because of his nice character. Remember, he is a Boy Scout. Please do not make him evil.
-I will randomly award GP's (Gift points) to chapters of 300 words or longer with no mistakes in grammar and spelling, which follow the story line. This won't be so hard to do, if you follow the other chapters.
-Have fun!
